subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets got seven shutout innings from Dillon Gee but could not protect a one-run lead in the ninth against the Atlanta Braves. A spectacular fielding play finished them off.
snippet: The Mets got seven shutout innings from Dillon Gee but could not protect a one-run lead in the ninth against the Atlanta Braves. A spectacular fielding play finished them off.
